long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edit Anything is a simple extension that allows you to edit text on any website. Click the pencil icon to turn text editing on or off. If you don't see the icon, click the puzzle button towards the top right of your browser and pin the extension to your extensions toolbar.

Edit Anything respects your privacy and does not record any of your data.
